DOC.brief_summary: To make laquinimod 0.6 mg available subject complete placebo-controlled MS-LAQ-302 study accord protocol evaluate long-term safety , tolerability effect disease course daily oral laquinimod 0.6 mg subject relapse multiple sclerosis .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Long-term Safety , Tolerability Effect Daily Oral Laquinimod 0.6 mg Disease Course Subjects With Relapsing Multiple Sclerosis
